attributes.action: on the day of the next general election hold a binding referendum on whether to change to a more proportional electoral system. This should be drawn up by a large jury of randomly selected citizens, given the time and information to deliberate on what voting system and other changes would make Parliament more accountable to citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition specifically demands that a system of PR is decided by a jury of the people.
